title: Drawing, "Assault of the Union Troops Upon Fort Thompson, Near New Bearne", ca. 1862
medium: Black, white gouache, black wash on illustration board

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Assault of the Union Troops Upon Fort Thompson, Near New Bearne", ca. 1862.
ca. 1862. Black, white gouache, black wash on illustration board. Gift of Willis M. Rose. 1947-87-13.
